title: Champion concept : Archeon, the traitor of the inquisition.
body:
Archeon (Ar- Kay - on) is a melee fighter who uses divine blades to dispatch his foes.
his skill set is relatively close to a ret paladin.
Deal with it.3

Stats:
Health: 573.8 (+80 per lvl)
Resource: Divine Power: 6 bars.
Attack Damage: 58.778 (+3.2 per lvl)
Attack Speed: 0.660 (+2.80% per lvl)
Movement Speed: 345
Health Regen: 6.34 (+0.65 per lvl)
Mana Regen: 7.23 (+0.65 per lvl)
Armour: 24.88 (+3.5 per lvl)
Magic Resist: 32.1 (+1.25 per lvl)


Passive: Divine magic: every 7 seconds  Archeon's basic attack will deal bonus damage based on his enemies max health and generate One Divine power. This replaces his mana bar. At 6 bars, his spells will do more damage and have bonus affects.
Basic Attack bonus damage: 2%/8%/12%/15% (Ranks up at levels 6/11/16)


[Q] Inquisitors Verdict:   Archeon imbues his blade with Holy power, smiting his target on his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and stunning. At 6 Divine Power, Inquisitors verdict will not restore any divine power, but will instantly reset the cooldown of his passive.
Bonus Damage: 30 / 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 (+ 0 / 5 / 10 / 15 / 20% AD)
Cooldown: 6.5/5.5/5/4.5/4 seconds.
stun duration:  0.5/0.75/1/1.25/1.5 seconds.


[W] Exorcism:  Archeon exorcises a target from a distance, dealing damage based on an enemies missing health. At full divine power, Archeon will return the exorcised spirit to the enemy, dealing bonus damage. 
Damage: 85/105/125/145/175 (+ 60% max attack damage)
Bonus damage: 35/70/85/95/105 FLAT DAMAGE.
execute damage: 1 attack damage for every 3% health missing from enemy.
Cooldown: 17/15/14/11/9


[E] The mark of Natu'La: Archeon's mark serves as a grim reminder of his betrayal. Activating this ability will give Archeon a temporary spell shield for 1.5 seconds, completely negating the next spell. If Archeon is at 6 divine power,  when the shield is broken, he will gain a temporary movepseed boost.
Cooldown: 21/18/16/13/11
movespeed: 20% for 2 seconds.


[R] Heresy: Archeon focuses demonic wrath into a final strike in melee range, which is only usable with 6 divine power. If this strike does not execute the target, Archeon's power rebounds onto himself, dealing 40% of the damage dealt to himself.  If the target does die,  Archeon ascends for 15 seconds, growing wings, which increase his movement speed. Archeon cannot kill himself with this ability., and after use, he can not regenerate Divine Power for 20 seconds.
Damage: 150/300/350 +40% of max AD.
Range: 150
Cooldown:  175/120/100 seconds.


Lore: The inquisition of Demacia is a secluded cult, nestled deep in the Terian Mountain ranges. Devoting their lives to the study of the Lightless Pact, Archeon was an exceptional student. He began his studying at the age of 9, after his father was discharged due to a rare sickness, spread by the Black mist in times of great darkness. Archeon, named after the first Inquisitor, joined the Inquisition to find a cure for this sickness and protect the people of his homeland. In the weeks leading up to his Graduation from the Academy of the Inquisitors, his young sister had fallen victim to the same disease of his deceased father. With his research of the disease not yet complete, he became desperate. Turning to the dark arts, he summoned Natu'La, the primordial god of sickness and begged him for a cure. The demonic god scoffed at the young Inquisitors request and ordered him to return him to the Voodoo lands. Filled with rage, Archeon threatened to destroy the god if he would not cure his sister. Amused by the young inquisitors outburst of rage, he agreed to cure his young sister, but Archeon would have to bear the Dark mark for the rest of his days. Archeon agreed. The next day, Archeon's sister was cured, but his mentor sensed a change in Archeons behavior. He became more agitated, snapping at the old inquisitor. He removed Archeons hood, and discovered the shifting mark of the dark god. Archeon told his mentor what had happened, and begged for forgiveness. When his mentor told him that he must kill his own sister to repent for his actions, Archeon refused, and in an outburst of rage, tore the old man apart with an explosion of holy light. Forced into self exile, Archeon wishes to forge a new inquisition as a balance between light and dark magics. But before he does that, he must prove himself as a warrior on the Fields of Justice.

Appearance:   Archeon wears a red cloak, belted at the waist. Metal flaps (sorta like a kilt. You know the thing I'm talking about) cover his thighs. His hood is up, and blond locks protrude from his hood. He wears simple black metal pauldrons  and leather gloves and boots, with simple black cloth pants. his weapons are black steel blades with inscriptions in a demonic language on them. A tome hangs from a chain at his belt with a pentagram on the leather cover.


Lore's pretty shoddy, and even I've gotta admit, he's sorta broken, but his numbers can be tweeked.
Hope you enjoy :DD
